section.title: Running Derby Server as Windows Service
section.para: The Derby Server is started via a batch program. In an server environment this batch program should be automatically started if the server is rebooted / started. The windows program "srvmgr" can be used for this purpose. For details on the tool please check the official documentation; the following will give a description how this can be used for Apache Derby. Install "srvmgr" and remember the installation path.
